Room.Name: Goblin Underground Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are stepping as silenty as possible down a dark passageway.
Room.LongDescription: At times your footsteps ring loudly, indicating close walls, although you cannot see them, and at other times they sound dull and distant as though the sound had nothing to bounce from for a long distance. Dimly to the east there is an archway which leads to a library. A torch set high in the ceiling gives off more smoke than light.
